stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
http://tricky3.co.uk/products/shopify-design-development

If you have an existing brand standard, with a logo and look/feel in mind, the I would be happy to build out a custom Shopify theme for your online business to your specifications.
Following an initial kick-off meeting to clarify broad vision and specific goals, a wire-frame layout, with design and user-interface notes, would be fleshed out into a fully functional Shopify store. This assumes that the desired look and feel has been conveyed in some kind of creative briefing document (if you don’t have one—or know what one is—then I can supply my preferred blank for you to complete.)
A store consists of the following primary templates, which would be produced as deliverables at weekly intervals, with associated milestone payments:
Index (home) & Static (“About us” etc.) Pages
banners & sliders
featured page/collection/product links
recent blog/news excerpts
mailing list sign-up
tight social integration
Collection pages
intuitive pagination and scrolling options
advanced sorting/filtering
Product pages
user-specified <meta> tags
product image switching & zoom
smart social sharing
This is a full service offering. I would also provide assistance with payment & shipping provider selection, integration and set-up; DNS config for custom domains; 3rd-party app integrations for accounting, marketing and customer relationship management.
title: Shopify design and development
